Lellouche bụ aha nna North-Africa; ụdị dị iche iche nke Lellouch, Lelouch, Alloush, Allouch na Allouche
O sitere na ezinụlọ Afroasiatic-Semitic, ebe a na-ahụ ya na Berber na Arabian Peninsula Arabic dị ka el allouch (alush), nke pụtara "nwa atụrụ"
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe iji gosipụta nwa atụrụ nwoke, ọ ka bụkwa aha njirimara ma ọ bụ okwu ịhụnanya na ụfọdụ ọdịbendị Nọt Afrika na Arabụ
